name: fsopart3notes
description: notes app for fso course part 3

scripts.build:ui: rd /s /q build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && xcopy C:\VSCodeProjects\fullstackopen\part2\phonebook\build C:\VSCodeProjects\fsopart3contacts\build /s /i
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Luis Angulo
